mean_cn: n.微弱稳定的光；喜悦，满足的心情；  vi.发光
mean_en: a gold or red colour; a dull steady light, especially from a fire that has stopped producing flames; the pink colour in your face when you have been doing exercise or feel happy and excited; a gold or red colour
sentence: The orange glow of the sunset is so beautiful!
sentence_trans: 夕阳的橘色光芒太美了！
